title: login
body:
I cant login on the login screen 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
Login problems can be caused by a number of different factors, including, but not limited to: Internet Explorer security settings (which League uses), network settings, or local configurations on the computer. Our [Login Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) covers the most common solutions, so I'd recommend giving those steps a go.

Let me know if you continue to encounter this error after taking those steps.
